genes.title: 使用方法
核心特性
genes.content:
- Request for papers from OpenReview (e.g., ICLR2026 submissions)
- Semantic search with example papers or text queries
- Support embedding caching 
- Embed model support: Open-source (e.g., all-MiniLM-L6-v2) or OpenAI
